Name: Technical Communication
Description: Ability to convey technical concepts clearly to non-technical audiences.

Name: Risk Management
Description: Identifying, evaluating, and mitigating risks to protect information systems.

Name: IT Project Management
Description: Planning and coordinating technology projects to meet organizational goals.

Name: Cryptography
Description: Understanding encryption methods and secure communication protocols.

Name: Cloud Security
Description: Implementing and managing security controls in cloud environments like AWS and Azure.

Name: Incident Response
Description: Handling and mitigating security incidents using established protocols.

Name: Network Troubleshooting
Description: Diagnosing and resolving issues across routers, switches, and firewalls.
